message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it at $95.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $88 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I see the value this product would bring you, so I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable to pay $89 for the product.
